multiplechoiceresponse.p: In the Maps app, add a boundary layer for districts in Trainingland and a thematic layer for the indicator “COVID-19 - Case Fatality rate (%)” from the indicator group “COVID-19” for the period of 2021 in the districts of Trainingland.

label.h3: Which districts experienced the highest case fatality rates in Trainingland in 2021?

div.p: In this example, the Staple District and Vegetable District experienced the highest ICU bed occupancy rates with over 7%. Adding labels in the boundary layer and having the boundary layer at the top of the layer cards will help you see the names of the districts.
